verification_results.details: Z3 verified: (s-1) + 1/2 = s - 1/2 for all s (algebraic identity)

verification_results.claim: Real Eigenvalue: s = 1/2 + i*gamma => lambda = gamma (real)
verification_results.details: Z3 verified: Im(lambda) = 1/2 - Re(s) = 0 when Re(s) = 1/2

verification_results.claim: Eigenvalue Value: lambda = gamma when s = 1/2 + i*gamma
Symmetry: C_qc(q) = C_qc(1-q) for all q in (0,1)
verification_results.details: Z3 verified: q(1-q) = (1-q)q is an algebraic identity
Z3 verified: 1/(q(1-q)) * q(1-q) = 1 for all q in (0,1)

verification_results.claim: Eigenfunction Exponent: a + 1/2 = s - 1/2 => a = s - 1
verification_results.details: Z3 verified: psi_s(q) = q^(s-1) is correct form

verification_results.claim: Conditional RH: Self-adjoint + Spectral Correspondence => RH
verification_results.details: Z3 verified: logical implication is valid
